entry.title: [SHARE] Interesting Findings #1
entry.content:
• Android is no longer (actually has been for a long time but this just confirmed it) open. Danny Sullivan suggested Google to separate Android into two with different names to avoid confusion. If I may, I suggest Android FREE and Android Pro. But Jason Harrop on the comment gave the best name for the free version.

  • iPhone 5 pre-order has been very disappointing. Oops, forgot to add <sarcasm> tag there. Too bad I cannot be part of the two million sheeps because my 4S contract is still not done yet.

  • Love this illustration of Wolverine. Via GeekTyrant.

  • This! I so want it!! Pretty expensive though, maybe somebody is kind enough to buy it for me? haha. Via Technabob.

  • 50% e-books campaign in O'Reilly is going to end soon. Better grab books that interest you fast. I purchased one.

/*===============================

How about say hi to me if you like this post?

================================*/

entry.title: Going Forward
entry.content:
I've been using many blogging services. Started with Wordpress, Blogger, Tumblr and most recent one was Posterous. I was satisfied with Posterous, until Twitter acquired them. For some reason, the posts I sent via email got published hours after I sent them. Asked them via Twitter about this but no response. So I figured it is time to move on.

Going forward, I'm going to use Octopress+Github Pages for blogging. Not really easy to setup, but seems cool. And this is the first post. I thought simply posting "Hello world" or "This is my first post" will be so boring. So I share with you a video from David Mitchell. I mean, just for his voice this video has to be shared.

Until next time.
